verses.verse: And the king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and they gathered <S%H622><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him all the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and all the men <S%H376><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and all the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> with him, and the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%>, and the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and all the people <S%H5971><s%>, both small <S%H6996><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%>: and he read <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their ears <S%H241><s%> all the words <S%H1697><s%> of the book <S%H5612><s%> of the covenant <S%H1285><s%> which was found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by a pillar <S%H5982><s%>, and made <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> and his testimonies <S%H5715><s%> and his statutes <S%H2708><s%> with all their heart <S%H3820><s%> and all their soul <S%H5315><s%>, to perform <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this covenant <S%H1285><s%> that were written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in this book <S%H5612><s%>. And all the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> Kohen <S%H3548><s%>, and the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> of the second order <S%H4932><s%>, and the keepers <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of the door <S%H5592><s%>, to bring forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8687><s%> out of the temple <S%H1964><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> that were made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8803><s%> for Baal <S%H1168><s%>, and for the grove <S%H842><s%>, and for all the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>: and he burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them without <S%H2351><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> in the fields <S%H7709><s%> of Kidron <S%H6939><s%>, and carried <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the ashes <S%H6083><s%> of them unto Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>.

And he put down <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the idolatrous Kohanim <S%H3649><s%>, whom the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> had ordained <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to burn incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8762><s%> in the high places <S%H1116><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and in the places round about <S%H4524><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>; them also that burned incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8764><s%> unto Baal <S%H1168><s%>, to the sun <S%H8121><s%>, and to the moon <S%H3394><s%>, and to the planets <S%H4208><s%>, and to all the host <S%H6635><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.

And he brought out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the grove <S%H842><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, without <S%H2351><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, unto the brook <S%H5158><s%> Kidron <S%H6939><s%>, and burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it at the brook <S%H5158><s%> Kidron <S%H6939><s%>, and stamped it small <S%H1854><s%> <S%H8686><s%> to powder <S%H6083><s%>, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the powder <S%H6083><s%> thereof upon the graves <S%H6913><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

And he brake down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the houses <S%H1004><s%> of the sodomites <S%H6945><s%>, that were by the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, where the women <S%H802><s%> wove <S%H707><s%> <S%H8802><s%> hangings <S%H1004><s%> for the grove <S%H842><s%>.

And he brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> all the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> out of the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the high places <S%H1116><s%> where the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> had burned incense <S%H6999><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, from Geba <S%H1387><s%> to Be'er-Sheva <S%H884><s%>, and brake down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the gates <S%H8179><s%> that were in the entering in <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of Y'hoshuw`a <S%H3091><s%> the governor <S%H8269><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, which were on a man's <S%H376><s%> left hand <S%H8040><s%> at the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Nevertheless the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> came not up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the altar <S%H4196><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, but they did eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the matzah <S%H4682><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And he defiled <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Topheth <S%H8612><s%>, which is in the valley <S%H1516><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Hinnom <S%H2011><s%>, that no man <S%H376><s%> might make his son <S%H1121><s%> or his daughter <S%H1323><s%> to pass through <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> to Molech <S%H4432><s%>.

And he took away <S%H7673><s%> <S%H8686><s%> the horses <S%H5483><s%> that the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the sun <S%H8121><s%>, at the entering in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, by the chamber <S%H3957><s%> of Natanmelech <S%H5419><s%> the chamberlain <S%H5631><s%>, which was in the suburbs <S%H6503><s%>, and burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the chariots <S%H4818><s%> of the sun <S%H8121><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%>.

And the altars <S%H4196><s%> that were on the top <S%H1406><s%> of the upper chamber <S%H5944><s%> of Ahaz <S%H271><s%>, which the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the altars <S%H4196><s%> which M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the two <S%H8147><s%> courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, did the king <S%H4428><s%> beat down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and brake them down <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from thence, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the dust <S%H6083><s%> of them into the brook <S%H5158><s%> Kidron <S%H6939><s%>.

And the high places <S%H1116><s%> that were before <S%H6440><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, which were on the right hand <S%H3225><s%> of the mount <S%H2022><s%> of corruption <S%H4889><s%>, which SHlomo <S%H8010><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> had builded <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for Ashtoreth <S%H6253><s%> the abomination <S%H8251><s%> of the Zidonians <S%H6722><s%>, and for K'mosh <S%H3645><s%> the abomination <S%H8251><s%> of the Moabites <S%H4124><s%>, and for Milcom <S%H4445><s%> the abomination <S%H8441><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%>, did the king <S%H4428><s%> defile <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.

And he brake in pieces <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the images <S%H4676><s%>, and cut down <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the groves <S%H842><s%>, and filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> their places <S%H4725><s%> with the bones <S%H6106><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>.

Moreover the altar <S%H4196><s%> that was at Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>, and the high place <S%H1116><s%> which Yarov`am <S%H3379><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nebat <S%H5028><s%>, who made Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> to sin <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, both that altar <S%H4196><s%> and the high place <S%H1116><s%> he brake down <S%H5422><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the high place <S%H1116><s%>, and stamped <S%H1854><s%> <S%H8689><s%> it small to powder <S%H6083><s%>, and burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the grove <S%H842><s%>.

And as Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> turned <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8799><s%> himself, he spied <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the sepulchres <S%H6913><s%> that were there in the mount <S%H2022><s%>, and sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the bones <S%H6106><s%> out of the sepulchres <S%H6913><s%>, and burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them upon the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and polluted <S%H2930><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it, according to the word <S%H1697><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> which the man <S%H376><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> proclaimed <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, who proclaimed <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8804><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%>.

Then he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What title <S%H6725><s%> is that <S%H1975><s%> that I see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8802><s%>? And the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> told <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, It is the sepulchre <S%H6913><s%> of the man <S%H376><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, and proclaimed <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> these things <S%H1697><s%> that thou hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let him alone <S%H3240><s%> <S%H8685><s%>; let no man <S%H376><s%> move <S%H5128><s%> <S%H8686><s%> his bones <S%H6106><s%>. So they let his bones <S%H6106><s%> alone <S%H4422><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, with the bones <S%H6106><s%> of the prophet <S%H5030><s%> that came out <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of SHomron <S%H8111><s%>.

And all the houses <S%H1004><s%> also of the high places <S%H1116><s%> that were in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of SHomron <S%H8111><s%>, which the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> had made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to provoke the YY to anger <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> took away <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, and did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to them according to all the acts <S%H4639><s%> that he had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in Beit-El <S%H1008><s%>.

And he slew <S%H2076><s%> <S%H8799><s%> all the Kohanim <S%H3548><s%> of the high places <S%H1116><s%> that were there upon the altars <S%H4196><s%>, and burned <S%H8313><s%> <S%H8799><s%> men's <S%H120><s%> bones <S%H6106><s%> upon them, and returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

And the king <S%H4428><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> all the people <S%H5971><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8798><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, as it is written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of this covenant <S%H1285><s%>.

Surely there was not holden <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8738><s%> such a passover <S%H6453><s%> from the days <S%H3117><s%> of the judges <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8802><s%> that judged <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, nor in all the days <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, nor of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>;

But in the eighteenth <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of king <S%H4428><s%> Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%>, wherein this passover <S%H6453><s%> was holden <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8738><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>.

Moreover the workers with familiar spirits <S%H178><s%>, and the wizards <S%H3049><s%>, and the images <S%H8655><s%>, and the idols <S%H1544><s%>, and all the abominations <S%H8251><s%> that were spied <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, did Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> put away <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8765><s%>, that he might perform <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of the Torah <S%H8451><s%> which were written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> that Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%> the Kohen <S%H3548><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

And like unto him was there no king <S%H4428><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him, that turned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the YY <S%H3068><s%> with all his heart <S%H3824><s%>, and with all his soul <S%H5315><s%>, and with all his might <S%H3966><s%>, according to all the Torah <S%H8451><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>; neither after <S%H310><s%> him arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%> there any like him.

Notwithstanding the YY <S%H3068><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not from the fierceness <S%H2740><s%> of his great <S%H1419><s%> wrath <S%H639><s%>, wherewith his anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%>, because of all the provocations <S%H3708><s%> that M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%> had provoked <S%H3707><s%> <S%H8689><s%> him withal.

And the YY <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I will remove <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> also out of my sight <S%H6440><s%>, as I have removed <S%H5493><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, and will cast off <S%H3988><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this city <S%H5892><s%> Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%> which I have chosen <S%H977><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the house <S%H1004><s%> of which I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, My name <S%H8034><s%> shall be there.

Now the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the acts <S%H1697><s%> of Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%>, and all that he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, are they not written <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the chronicles <S%H1697><s%> <S%H3117><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> ?

In his days <S%H3117><s%> PharaohN'khoh <S%H6549><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against the king <S%H4428><s%> of Ashur <S%H804><s%> to the river <S%H5104><s%> Euphrates <S%H6578><s%>: and king <S%H4428><s%> Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against <S%H7125><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him; and he slew <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him at Megiddo <S%H4023><s%>, when he had seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him.

And his servants <S%H5650><s%> carried him in a chariot <S%H7392><s%> <S%H8686><s%> dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8801><s%> from Megiddo <S%H4023><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him to Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>, and buried <S%H6912><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him in his own sepulchre <S%H6900><s%>. And the people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Jehoahaz <S%H3059><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yoshiyah-yahu <S%H2977><s%>, and anointed <S%H4886><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and made him king <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in his father's <S%H1><s%> stead.

Jehoahaz <S%H3059><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> and three <S%H7969><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> when he began to reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; and he reigned <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> months <S%H2320><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>. And his mother's <S%H517><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Hamutal <S%H2537><s%>, the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Yirmeyah-yahu <S%H3414><s%> of Libnah <S%H3841><s%>.

And he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, according to all that his fathers <S%H1><s%> had done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And PharaohN'khoh <S%H6549><s%> put him in bands <S%H631><s%> <S%H8799><s%> at Riblah <S%H7247><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Hamath <S%H2574><s%>, that he might not reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in Yerushalayim <S%H3389><s%>; and put <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> to a tribute <S%H6066><s%> of an hundred <S%H3967><s%> talents <S%H3603><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and a talent <S%H3603><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>.
